scripts.start: npm run client:build & npm run client:dev & npm run server
scripts.render-start: npm run client:build & npm run render-server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd server && py -m pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.render-install: cd server && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.github-install: cd server && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.render-build: cd server && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../client && npm i
